website_summaries.verdict: This model delivers a surprisingly good picture for the price. The best portable projector for budget-minded buyers.
pros: Compatible with a wide range of streaming devices

customer_reviews.title: So far so good .
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to wait until i had it for a week . so i had this product for a week and i can really say it's awesome so far . i just connected my own speakers to the projector. Hooked my firestick up to it we are good to go . Update : This is the best projector ever . I get so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: My needs and expectations were low for this projector, and I am pleasantly surprised! All I wanted was a halfway decent projection on my wall to watch movies and it suits me just fine. It is so easy to set up, no directions needed. Plugged a fire stick right into the side of it and it works no problem. Picture isn’t the sharpest but it’s not bad either. The fan is a bit noisy but that was expected. Built in speakers are okay but I plugged it into my old Echo Tap for better audio. Overall this is a great value set. If you want more, you’re gonna have to pay (a lot) more.
customer_reviews.author: Susanseu

customer_reviews.title: Great projector at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my projector for about three weeks and have been very happy with it. It connects easily to my computer with the included HDMI cable and the picture quality is very good even with moderate light. It’s very easy to adjust the focus and I can easily read closed captioning. The sound quality is very good too through the built in speakers. The only slight negatives are the remote needs to be pointed directly at the projector to adjust the volume, and the fan noise is a little loud. Overall it’s a great little projector for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Four for me

customer_reviews.title: Excellent projector
customer_reviews.text: Well spent money on this little thing. It is small and has lots of standard features. I wish it has wireless or maybe bluetooth connection so i can use the phone too? I have not seen any projectors has wireless capability. As you can see in my video, i did not have the projector screen up and my wall is an old type of wall. It is not flat and smooth. The quality of this thing is amazing. Screen looks amazing and lightweight. It is well built as well. The video was a 720p i downloaded from youtube for this purpose. Looks great is it not?
customer_reviews.author: SharkBytes

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price! AAA+
customer_reviews.text: The projector arrived last night and after locating the right cables for my phone to connect to the device, I set the device up. That worked fine. I also tried the SD card and HDMI set up to the TV. I had no problems with any of the tried inputs, very easy setup and the projector has many multiple video input options available. The image, after adjusting was very bright and clear and the sound was crisp and vibrant as well. For the price, you can't go wrong. I do intend to purchase a screen as I will be using this outdoors during the summer when we have parties and I can play music videos outside. AAA+
customer_reviews.author: Kurt L Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this medium-sized projector has worked beautifully. We initially purchased it to project halloween decor onto pumpkins, but have also used it outside for a movie. The speakers are a bit quiet and I was worried about the low resolution, but you can use external speakers and the quality of the low resolution image was better than I expected. I'm sure it doesn't come close to comparing it to a high end protector, but that wasn't my intent when I purchase it. Again, the price is low and the quality better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good brightness but focus not sharp enough
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a solid product, and it did give me a nice large projected image that had adequate brightness in a semi-dark room. The keystone adjustment worked fine. Where it fell down was in focus - it simply could not be focused to give an adequately sharp rendering of a page of text, in my case song lyrics for my ukulele group. So I returned it. I had high hopes, I guess I will have to spend more to get what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Poor connectivity.  Poor directions
customer_reviews.text: Initial impression after 1.5 hrs attempting to pair an iPhone 7. NEGATIVE I bought adapter and followed the crappy guide. Downloaded several screen mirroring aps. Never did get a signal. I absolutely hate this projector. I am very angry that I’ve wasted several hrs with this, and I still have to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Newman

customer_reviews.title: Terrible projector, terrible magnification, lots of bugs
customer_reviews.text: I regret this purchase so much! I missed the return window so I'm stuck with it. It barely projects, no matter how I adjust the lens it's still blurry, and it constantly freezes then goes back to the home screen. I bought the other one on amazon with like 17k 5 star reviews and the difference is night and day. Do not waste money on this.
customer_reviews.author: ADHD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to work and good quality picture.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been searching for a >$100 mini projector and after some time I decided upon this one. So far I’ve only used it to watch YouTube videos off the MacBook. The picture quality is better than expected especially on a cream colored wall.
customer_reviews.author: peonyfairie4

customer_reviews.title: Great for dorm rooms
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing thing to have for a dorm room. The projector itself works great. However the hdmi cable was not working when I tested the projector out. I have one of my own so it was not a major issue, but it could have been if I didn’t already own one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time with this cant focus
customer_reviews.text: Not very bright for 4200 lux. Could never focus well. Think becuase it's only 1080 supported and not actually 1080 active display. Even though it's cheap it's just to cheap all around to be worth keeping
customer_reviews.author: John Dow

customer_reviews.title: Super portable and quiet. But short power cable
customer_reviews.text: Great little projector. I tested it out in my living room and it was able to play movies at 1080p smoothly. The fan noise is relatively quiet and brightness is decent for this price range projectors. I’m primary using it for gaming and movies and will project it on the side of my house outdoor during summer. The setup was easy plug and play. I just wish the power cable was longer. It’s about 5 feet or so.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Not 1080p but Decent
customer_reviews.text: I tried a couple of cheap mini projectors and this ended up being my favorite. The picture quality isn't 1080p but compared to the previous projector this was way better. It's nice if you want to stream sports or movies from your computer but don't expect anywhere near a true HD experience with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice,Surprising
customer_reviews.text: It really surprised me. I wanna a projector for a long time but the projector on amazon are so expensive or so many problems. this one is a real bargain. Picture is very clear and the size is perfect . i watched several movies with friends.it's a totally different view experience with cinema.but there is no highligt in sound effects, maybe it's a common problem for projector,if necessary,you can buy a speaker. I have to say, it's also a good tool for learning. big screen, soft light, adjustable size. Generally speaking, this is a nice shopping experience. If you wanna improve your view experience but in budget control, it maybe a good choice :)
customer_reviews.author: Zikang Cao

customer_reviews.title: Solid Projector for Price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this projector for 2 weeks now, so far it's been working really well for the price. In the picture it's shown just projected onto a wall, as you can see the color is good. Sound-wise I would suggest getting a cheap speaker to plug into, it's fine until you have a larger group of people, then it's kinda hard to hear with the fan. The fan is not super obnoxious. All in all it's a great projector for watching movies and playing games in a dorm setting. It comes with an HDMI cord and RCA adapter which was nice
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price....
customer_reviews.text: The projector arrived on schedule I was very pleased with that. Used it the next day for the very first time and it showed an amazing picture. It also works with the Roku. USB port works perfect. The sound is a little too low so I hooked up my blackweb speaker via Aux and it sounded like we were at the movie theater. The remote button was messed up when it arrived but other than that it does its job. I'm loving it. My family and I are looking forward to more movie night outside. Pictures coming soon
customer_reviews.author: Lora Tate

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality + built in speakers...
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were all good, and yet, I was surprised by how good the picture quality is. Been using this about an hour so far (with Google Chromecast) plugged in. Projector has built in speakers (which are loud)... and it has a USB plug which you can use as a power source for Chromecast/Roku. Used this on a wall (as you can tell by the clock) and it looked great!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Work!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought ELEPHAS Mini Projector, Full HD 1080P and 180" Display, 3600 Lux Portable Home Theater Projector with 50,000 Hours LED Lamp Life, Compatible with USB. It doesn't work. I used my computer and my friend's via the HDMI and the screen just shows no signal. If it cannot work, I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Chen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful low budget projector
customer_reviews.text: This projector picture quality is great especially in the dark. For daylight time adjusting the brightness helps. Remote controls has all the function that is needed. Front and rear ceiling direction with adjustment options are good. It has all the variety of possible needed ports. In built speakers are loud enough. Works upto 200+ inches screen size with same picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sam1

customer_reviews.title: Impressive picture!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe 3 years ago I bought a USED projector that's twice the weight and 50% larger for around $300. It's a short throw, with similar specs as this, although not LED. I am amazed that $90 will buy a device that delivers such a good picture, has so many inputs, and is simple to setup and use. Longevity is the only question now
customer_reviews.author: USERBOSCO

customer_reviews.title: Impressive picture
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to purchase a cheaper priced projector because I will only be using it outdoors. I have heard that in less than perfect conditions it is tough to find a good projector. Well this is the one! The only downside I have is you need a speaker. The internal speakers are not very good. Any outside noise at all will make it hard to hear the audio. Overall, this is an awesome projector for the price!
customer_reviews.author: jpress

customer_reviews.title: Love it! But company uses gift as bait for reviews
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. Quality is fantastic and the price is amazing. The kids love having a projector in the sunroom. Now I have had the product for 7 weeks. The rating for the product has fallen to a 3 and the company to a 1. The item is appropriately priced for the quality, however company offers a gift for your review and does not provide goft as advertised. There are cheaper options for lesser money on amazon. I would recommend the product but discourage the company.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Good little projector- great at this pricepoint!
customer_reviews.text: This projector punches above it's weight class since it costs so little but has a lot of good features that you wouldnt expect to find at this price. Picture is bright in a dark/dim room. Wouldn't be great for board room/presentations in a bright room but works great for movies and video games. Small footprint as well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wilson

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic little machine!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little machine! I was a little skeptical due to the compact size and cheap price, but it’s all it’s advertised to be and more. I’ve been using it for about 2 weeks now and haven’t had any issues. I have it hooked up to my chrome cast/google home and it makes everything incredibly easy to use. The picture quality is great once it’s positioned and focussed properly, and doesn’t need to be adjusted at all. Works great projecting into a light coloured wall, no screen needed. Had some issues with shipping originally, but once I contacted the company they sorted everything out very quickly and professionally. Overall great experience!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend for Christmas and nothing works on it. I bought it for the simple task of projecting my phone screen. I couldn’t decipher the instructions that appeared to be written by a two year old, so I went online for help. I found some online instructions that were easy to follow, yet didn’t work. I don’t understand how someone could make such a bad product that is supposed to such a simple task, yet fails to even come close to doing it. One of the worst purchases of my life. Thanks for ruining Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded My Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I Brought This Projector Because I Like To Play My Ps4 And My Brother Always Wanna Watch Tv So Instead Of Buying Another Tv I Brought This Projector Which Doesn’t Take Up Much Space As Two TVs Would In One Room And I Can Travel With It Every Where I Go Very Portable So This Is A Great Choice
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Lane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: Used for Halloween outdoor projection. Used with a nearly invisible screen. Worked perfectly for several hours. Got so many compliments. Speakers are ok, but I didnt buy it because it had speakers. Does have audio jack to connect other speakers. The built in user interface to play video files directly from a memory or usb thumb stick did not play common video formats I tried, BUT it easily plugged right into a laptop via HDMI and worked without any flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: I'M very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I'M very satisfied,I used it the night after receiving the goods.The projector process is very exquisite, the workmanship is very good, abd the use is cinvenient and quick.,I played it for more than two hours and was very satisfied with the effect. Especially after turnibg off the lights, the picture is oarticularly clear, and it really enjoys the visual effect of 1080P full HD.Now use it to watch movies and Tv dramas reLLY enjoy it, especially watching the game is particularly enjiyable, like watching a big screen HD TVgame, clearly. personally think that it is a very cost–effective product, in line with my requirements and expectations
customer_reviews.author: Luanna Moon

customer_reviews.title: This is the best projector, quality price ratio talking.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best projector, quality price ratio talking. It does not look like a toy projector, which I expected at this price. It have a nice looking carrying bag with all the cables you need, as well as a remote. The projector itself have a good luminosity and image, as you can see in the picture (however I've set the projector way too close in my basement setting). The sound is no greater than a laptop speaker, but it's not what I'm looking for in this product. It's a solid-looking professional or leasure projector. To get a significant better projector, you would need to pay around 700-800$. Totally worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and features. Best option for budget.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture Quality. 3600 lux makes a whole difference vs. lower illumination. After reviewing and comparing 12 of the better rated mini-projectors I found that this Elephas brand had all the characteristics I was looking for. Also, this projector is compatible with standard camera tripoids and I was able to install using my old tripod. Keystone and focus easy to adjust to get perfect image. So far, very satisfied with this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Zaus

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price! As soon as it arrived at our door we opened it up. The packaging told the tale of quality in their products. Very well packed, in manufacturers box, ensuring no damage would come to the projector. Took it out of the box, plugged it power, plugged in the HDMI cable and started to enjoy the NHL playoffs! That simple. High Definition picture quality was great. As with most projectors, a dim setting is preferred. The carrying case is very adequate to store all the cabling and projector. Price line is also good for the quality of the projection. Can't wait for RV time to set it up underneath the awning!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kim

customer_reviews.title: Solid so far!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for daughters room for sleepovers. Definately not bluyray quality image, but for the price we are very happy with it so far. Setting up is brainless. Has a solid feel build quality as well. We were intised with a gift for our honest review ... and this is honestly what i think.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A

customer_reviews.title: Affordable quality
customer_reviews.text: So far this projector has been great, picture is really clear at closer distances(ours is about 10 ft from the wall.) remote functions well and makes using the projector convenient. It plays sound but cannot be adjusted so I’d advise planning alternative speakers or sound system but overall really pleased for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Home movie theater!
customer_reviews.text: The package includes the projector, remote ,power cable, HDMI cable, VGA cable and a customized carrying bag. All is well packed: the whole thing in protective bubble this and in the box. The projector is very lightweight and stylish. Shipping as always super fast! This is a wonderful video projector. Easy enough to setup and use. Good for this price range, Picture quality was surprisingly good. love it for watching shows on my amazon fire stick, Great picture! Perfect for watching movies in the living room! We can sit on the couch and enjoy movies on a 100 inch screen, or play with my kids .~~~~And low price!!!! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Xiaowen Z.

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Great picture, great value!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this projector! Picture quality is amazing, and it’s extremely easy to set up and use. I use it with a 120” screen and the picture is clear as day, I highly recommend this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Marc E. Balas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? This thing kicks ass! I used it in my back yard to put on a movie for a birthday party. It worked great. Everyone we had over wanted to know where we got it (like anyone uses anything other that amazon these days). At any rate, I ended up sending the link out to several parents.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: An amazing projector hands down. Although it may be bulkier than other brands in the same price range, this one bests competitors in quality and durability. Very clean look and lightweight as well. I definitely plan on bringing it to movie outings with family and friends and this projector makes this possible.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the projector. It is a real value. The screen and stand for the projector is key to a satisfying viewing. I've found that the projector lamp needs some break in period before you get full brightness and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Thewolfryder

customer_reviews.title: projector
customer_reviews.text: This is a very clear projector, it is easy to operate, the effect is very good, it took a few days to really like it, the seller's service attitude is also very good, the remote control was not sent to me, I will reissue it to me immediately after asking. The speed is very fast, there will be new products in the future, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: YOYO

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little unit I've been looking for a projector for a while and found this one
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little unit I've been looking for a projector for a while and found this one, super easy setup and use great bang for your buck.the ease of the focus and the ability to angle your projector with the simple turn of a knob is great,the built I adjustment leg allows for a simple set up on nearly any surface the picture is the projection on a gray wall first one is middle of the day, sun shining bring and still a great image second is curtis drawn and it's a little better but I feel it's a great image and am very excited for movie nights outside under the stars
customer_reviews.author: Danes Mose Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector for the price, a little noisy
customer_reviews.text: Clean crisp picture, excellent sound, solid build and quality manufacturing. The only complaint I would have is that the fan/cooling system is a little loud for an indoor/small setting. It would be better suited for outdoors. Otherwise excellent price and product
customer_reviews.author: Justin Nester

customer_reviews.title: Great little projector
customer_reviews.text: Great little projector. Lightweight, steady, sturdy, bright enough to project outdoors. I used this to project singing pumpkins from about 7/8 feet away so not sure about big screens but it did the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D.

customer_reviews.title: Option
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good for gaming , I use it regularly , I already had a couple movie nights with the family and they loved it , just get a sound bar with this and it’s a wrap, the brightness option and just all of the option can fix it to your liking there’s so many modes to use it on and you can connect your Xbox to it , and you can connect your phone but you got to buy the adapter for it separately but all in all this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Bought this, used it a few times and the speakers do not work now.
customer_reviews.author: Aly G

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Works great even on a dark painted, textured wall. Only issue was the speaker went out after a month. Not a huge concern since i put a sound bar on it, like newer television speakers they are o.k. but you really need a decent secondary sound system to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: al hall

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this unit works great. The best way to view is to get a white satin sheet to display the images. It's more reflective than any other material.
customer_reviews.author: Chilibob

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent projector for the price!! Clear image, great sound (though I bought a sound bar for the surround sound feel), and my favorite feature - the sleep timer! It’s hooked up to my Roku stick and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: For the proce this projector is great. I use it in my room and also set it up outside. The picture quality is great even once the picture is quite large. It is easy to focus and set up. I will say i couldn't get it to work my phone. I usually use it with my dvd play or my roku. For that it is wonderful. The speaks aren't bad. I hook them up to my own set for better sound.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: movie anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Like the features with the projector coming with , you can watch movie anywhere, its very handy, picture quality is good , bright. Can attach with number of things , i mostly like that i can use my phone to see special big games on big screens
customer_reviews.author: Inder

customer_reviews.title: Poor longevity
customer_reviews.text: Had this item for a little over 4 months before the projector started showing a black shadow covering 40% of the screen. Not fixable even with the troubleshooting. Definitely won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Picture deteriorates quickly.
customer_reviews.text: There's a yellow spot on the screen after less than 4 weeks of use. Black specks showing up on the projected picture even after cleaning the lens. Something on the inside is leaving permanent black spots on the projection. Fan noise turned from regular air moving to an unbalanced louder noise. Tried to add photo... No option to add photo.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rains

customer_reviews.title: Portable and great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this projector. It was easy to set up and has great picture quality. It’s small and very portable. The picture is nice and bright. The projector does have a built in speaker to listen to the movie. There are many ports on the side for connections. I really liked that it came with an HDMI cable. This is a great product. We are really enjoying this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Marybel Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Maintance
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product for the price. But about a month into use, the bulb burned out. Well I should say it continually burned out every time I watched a dark sccene. The stress on the bulb turned the whole screen white. I have been troubleshooting for days. The manual does not help with bulb replacement. Am I supposed to buy a bulb thats 2.5x the price of the projector?? There are a lot of unanswered questions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small projector prices
customer_reviews.text: Great for small projector prices. Don't want to get anything high-end or expensive. For the price, this is great. The packaging with the carrying case is very good. Not too loud, if you put the speaker on the volume you can forget the fan. I am satisfied with this purchase. However, my projector has a mark on the internal lens. I contacted the customer service and their customer service department quickly responded and reached a solution. I am very happy that the company knows what customer service is!
customer_reviews.author: virginia cruz

customer_reviews.title: definitely well worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: definitely well worth the money spent. it has a great picture quality and pretty loud speakers. what i especially like is that usb disks can be connected where I pre download movies. it can be used with a medium light but I would definitely recommend using it in a completely dark room. what I did not like is that it is a bit noisy and if you are watching pictures or using it for a presentation it might be annoying. however if you are watching a video or a movie the noise does not bother at all.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Mejía

customer_reviews.title: Good budget projector
customer_reviews.text: I'm shocked how clear it is in a dark room I like it the only thing I don't like is the speaker so I added mine and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Home theater in the house!
customer_reviews.text: It's so fun to turn on the projector and stay home where the kids can talk through the entire movie or make shadow puppets in the light while popcorn cooks in the microwave! We never have to ruin another person's experience in the movie theater again and for the price of this little projector, you cannot go wrong. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a more expensive competitors product and it failed in 30 day. Decided to give this unit a try and it is out performing and lasting the more expensive unit. The remote is designed well and the projector is quite.
customer_reviews.author: TIM T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, awesome, affordable home movie projector!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for an affordable projector for home movies. This fits the bill perfectly. Although it is not designed for 1080p, it is good enough for our home viewing. It's like we have our own movie theater at home. I love watching Netflix, Redbox and my blu-ray collection on this. Picture quality is not top-quality but for the price and for my needs, I'll take it over 5-10x more expensive projectors.
customer_reviews.author: ps3_rules

customer_reviews.title: Compact but powerful!
customer_reviews.text: i love this little projector. Good quality for the price. Easy to connect and use. Comes with the connectors, including HDMI cable and clicker. I use it for presentations and can't wait to watch a movie with it!
customer_reviews.author: Angel H

customer_reviews.title: Bright Functional Projector
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. There are multiple ways to use this product such as through HDMI, usb, etc. The function I use the most on this device is through the Samsung DeX feature on the Galaxy S10+. Just connect an HDMI and you can use your phone as a computer. Add the projector and you can use it virtually anywhere you have power.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great price for what you get!
customer_reviews.text: I love it works great with my gaming system and laptop devices. Also works with Blu-ray players. Very solid device and portable. I recommend it definitely!
customer_reviews.author: Segovia

customer_reviews.title: The picture is surprisingly great
customer_reviews.text: The picture is surprisingly great ,colors are reproduced well, text is perfectly readable, and I don't mind the slight screen door effect! The unit is definitely bright enough for use in a dark room or at night, but not so much during the day! It does not require a projection cloth, it can be projected on a white wall, and it is really convenient to carry with ! The bulb does not get hot to touch; there is no need to let it cool down before packing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Celeste Michael

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: I was just looking for a cheap projector for my fantasy football draft. This thing is amazing. Picture looks great, speaker is good, and how can you beat the price? Buy it you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Houser

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: watching cartoons or anime using only a white wall i can say the picture quality is excellent, while in movies it’s just fair probably because im using only white wall instead of projector screen, the delivery is fast (unexpected) easy to use plug & play by the way i use apple TV to watch, HDMI working well, i tried the USB to watch movies but no luck maybe i have to choose the format of the movies i downloaded
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always liked watching movies on a projector. I bought a big projector before,but it is too big to take away. So I bought this mini projector. I tried it last night. It is as clear as my previous projector. It is a lot cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Very good resolution.
customer_reviews.text: I am really surprise because it is a very good projector that has very cheap price. Only minor issue: remote control’s signal to its projector is not really well connecting.
customer_reviews.author: Nhon V. Doan

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality is pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Videoprojector delivered with everything needed. I had a competitor for a room, and this one I use punctually for my business trips: its small size that I can put it in my bag without worries, and with a USB-> HDMI cable I can enjoy my movies at the hotel. Thanks to integrated speakers, I do not need to provide additional sound, and I enjoy a screen much larger than the tiny TV hotels. The picture quality is pretty good)
customer_reviews.author: Kania white

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. Pictures is ok for what we are using it for. The app you have to download is not good. And I didn’t receive a remote
customer_reviews.author: MMDDN1976

customer_reviews.title: I have to say I am truly impressed by this small projector.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I am truly impressed by this small projector. I have owned other projectors but this one is pretty great. Pros: - easy set up - reads most formats - low fan noise and stays cool - great picture quality Cons: - may take a little time to find your personal sweet spot for colors. I can't wait to use this for Halloween to rear project ghosts and goblins in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Great projector for the price but when I adjust the focus to make the center clearer the outside gets a little bit blurry. I only noticed this when looking at the time at the bottom right and seeing that it was blurry and then adjusting it to make it clearer but in turn made the center blurry. This is not noticeable when watching movies though. Still a great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: elvia

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best things I’ve ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best things I’ve ever bought. Great colours for such an inexpensive projector and the picture quality is great. Options to customise what you want and the fan is relatively quiet compared to other more expensive projectors I’ve had. Recommending it to everyone I know, even works great just on a white wall without a projector screen. 10/10 across the board wonderfully small and easy to move around as well.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Constant

customer_reviews.title: Amazed with quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazed by the quality at this price. I used other protector at this price but brightness is not as good as this projector. No blur edges at 130" I tried so far. And it has great bright picture 1080 hd quality. Sound quality is ok but can't expect more
customer_reviews.author: Amit B

customer_reviews.title: You’ll waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Thing is completely trash. Read a lot of good reviews so I bought it. Lasted 1 day before it would no longer turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this projector
customer_reviews.text: So I've used this twice now for movie nights and the quality of picture is great. I use my Chromecast to stream movies from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very Practical
customer_reviews.text: It's compact and light enough for carrying. I don't know if it really handles 3600 Lumens but it is bright enough for an illuminated room although the ideal conditions are in darkness where it looks great. The only drawback I find is the need for projecting at the same height where your screen is since keystone adjustment is very limited and focus is affected by that.
customer_reviews.author: Josué A.

customer_reviews.title: The projector is worth 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The projector is worth 5 starsThe picture sharpness was higher than expected, the brightness was as expected (Room has to be dark). The screen is just a sheet but they did include command hooks to hang it so I was able to setup a screen in my travel trailer, it was sunset so far too bright to use it. I did set it up on a tripod in my kids room for a movie night and from 5' away it made a good show and a nice family memory.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Thompson

customer_reviews.title: The projector is easy to use with no addtional adapters required for my need
customer_reviews.text: The projector is easy to use with no addtional adapters required for my need. I use it primary for enlarging picture from a flash drive. It’s as simple as plug and play, the picture is clear and in great color.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Good product, very good quality, easy to use and excellent, recommended by the seller
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Item was OK but late to ship
customer_reviews.text: Item was late to ship, but otherwise mediocre for it's class.
customer_reviews.author: Skeletor

customer_reviews.title: Nooooope!
customer_reviews.text: 3600 lux ( about 113 lumen ) is a bit misleading. Unless u have a very dark room, this device is nowhere near bright enough. Doesnt come with a user manual. If u have set up a projector before u know u need a trapizoidal setting which i havnt found one here. I will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: njmoody

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this Perfect for home movies. Projects a clean crisp image on the wall. It is like having a big screen TV.
customer_reviews.author: satyanam

customer_reviews.title: Too Loud
customer_reviews.text: Though I researched a lot of projectors within my price range I ended up a bit disappointed with this purchase. The projector's fan is quite loud which makes it difficult to enjoy the picture quality...
customer_reviews.author: rainbow stein

customer_reviews.title: Not returnable
customer_reviews.text: If you purchase from ELEPHAS-Direct the projector is not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Roku or Amazon Fire is the easiest set up
customer_reviews.text: I definitely think if you want to buy this product, have a roku stick or amazon for stick for easier set up. I tried my phone through a usb charger cable, I tried a av cord to my phone, and the hdmi is so much easier just to plug a roku up or a fire stick. I have both and tried it and it works amazingly. It was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: this projector has been perfect
customer_reviews.text: The the purpose I had bought it for, this projector has been perfect. I have been using it for power point presentations. The propjector is easy to carry around and of good solid quality. Only draw back is that it is not as bright As I would like and a little noisy from the fan as one woudl expect. The company offered a free tripod that was really good aswell. The tripod was of good solid constrction
customer_reviews.author: Sinead Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good image for the price! It was perfect for my bedroom room, now I have my personal movie theater =)
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far I love this little projector!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this little projector! I purchased it with the intention of outdoor movie night. This evening I am trying it in the house to see how it it. I feel like the image is pretty great given I am watching something on a bedsheet! The sound is good from the projector. The fan is a little loud but not too much! I think once I am outside and there is background noise I will hardly notice it!
customer_reviews.author: luke parry

customer_reviews.title: have wonderful contrast, bright and budget friendly
customer_reviews.text: I have run it for the whole movie, the project did not get heated like traditional projector. In the meantime it was super bright and have the great contrast and the color.
customer_reviews.author: Sabanam Lakhey

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible
customer_reviews.text: Not great picture quality but does work ok. Far from HD
customer_reviews.author: RHONDA R.

customer_reviews.title: This is great little projector
customer_reviews.text: This is great little projector, very light and easy to setup. I ran it for quite a few hours the first day i got it and it didn't run too hot. It's too grainy to read word documents on or surf facebook very well but it works quite well for gaming or movies. It is quite bright but don't expect to be able to see the picture well if you're close to a window on a sunny day.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Moore

customer_reviews.title: Works well for both home theater and business presentations
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased that this product works well for both home theater and business presentations, when connected to a laptop. Bright, sharp image. Easy to connect to, portable and light. Wish it had come with a carrying case. Unable to get any type of file (movie, image, or music) to play correctly off the USB but that wasn't the primary intention of the purchase. Overall, satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Reh

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: First time using a projector and I was honestly very pleased with it we used it outside the picture was clear and it was very easy to use I’m not tech savvy and I connected the speaker and iPhone to it and I can’t wait to get more use out of it
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For $70 and for that size this is pretty amazing. The image quality in a dark room is really really good. Terrible in day light though but that's fine, I plan to use it in a dark room anyway. The sound quality from its speakers is bad so I recommend having speakers
customer_reviews.author: amer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect picture!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a projector and this one was cost efficient, so I bought it. This thing is awesome! The picture is bright and crisp and the sound is great. I hooked up my firestick to and and omg the possibilities are endless. Great product from a great company!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.text: I love this projector. Works very well. I'll have to upload pics later.
customer_reviews.author: MCE.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price. Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with for the price. Great quality. Only negative is lack of options with sound but a tech savvy person can work around that. We used phone to bridge the Bluetooth from our Roku to outdoor speaker and solved our sound problem.
customer_reviews.author: B Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and pricing
customer_reviews.text: I love my projector. It is a great portable size. The quality is great as well. I am very satisfied with this purchase. I use my firestick with it and I have no issues. I’m glad I finally invested in one and the price is amazing for the use and quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Soqueisha

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: Projector came with out any issues. Hooked up very easy to our blue ray player. Was simple to get movie to play on it. Adjustments for focus and tilt were simple to use and worked well. Picture was clear and bright. Can’t wait to use this projector at the camp ground. Great projector for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Loved Mommy

product_meta.title: ELEPHAS Mini Projector, Full HD 1080P and 180" Display, 4200 Lux Portable Home Theater Projector with 50,000 Hours LED Lamp Life, Compatible with USB/HD/SD/AV/VGA Interfaces
product_meta.description: Color:BlackELEPHAS constantly focus on providing our customers with high-quality products as well as affordable price. As a 10-years professional projector manufacturer, we keep enhancing the display technology of LCD screen, fan noise suppression technology and new version upgraded. Our target is sharing customers from all over the world with the newest technology. Choose ELEPHAS GC333, Choose Every Wonderful Moment in Your Life. Specification: Light Source: LED Lamp Life: 50, 000 Hours Native Resolution: 800*480Max Support: 1080PContrast Ratio: 2000: 1Projection Size: 32"-236" in 1. 1m-7. 2mKeystone Correction: 15°Audio Input: 3. 5mmPackaging Accessories: GC333 Projector*1User Manual*1Power Cable*1AV Cable*1HDMI Cable*1 (HDMI Adaptor is NOT included)Screw (Adjustable Feet) *1
feature_bullets: 100% Warranty: ELEPHAS provides 3-years warranty and timely professional technical support. The projector has the approval certificates with CE FCC RoHS PSE. Any questionsplease kindly contact us. We will try our best to resolve the problems for you.
